page.title: 06DAILY LIFE, HASELOR, WARKS.
page.content: I wake up at about 7.00a.m. and I have a yawn and a big stretch. Then I get out of bed and I get my school uniform on, I brush my hair and go downstairs to have my breakfast. For breakfast I have weetabix with butter and jam, and I have toast. As I live in Oversley Green I go to school in the car with my sisters unless Mummy says that we can cycle. As Daddy is a farmer and is usually very busy, Mummy drives us to school.She also cycles with us,we can not go on our own because of my young sister and because we have to go along the main Alcester to Stratford road which is very busy. When I get home after school I play until 5.00pm.then we have tea.At 7.00 we get ready for bed,I clean my teeth,wash my hands and face. I go to bed to read until 7.30pm then I go to sleep. Sophie Corbett a girl aged 11.
